sect1.title: OS support modules
sect1.para: The following modules add support for different OSs.

sect2.title: macosx
sect2.para: This is the MacOS X support module, including a native interface.

sect2.title: qnx
sect2.para: This is the QNX RTOS support module.

sect1.title: Miscellaneous
sect1.para: This section describes a few more modules that don't belong to any of the categories described before.
sect1.sect2:
mozilla &disabled;
This is not really a module. When enabled, a VLC-based Mozilla plugin is built.

sect1.title: Compilation Options
sect1.para: There are a few options that you can set when running the configure script, which are not related to modules.
You can have a look at these options by typing:
You can for example control all the installation directories, the system for which you want to build VLC for (if not guessed correctly),...
You can also choose to enable or disable some optimizations.

sect2.title: --disable-plugins
sect2.para: If you select this option, no plugins will be enabled. This is definitely not recommended, as you would get a very poor VLC, and should only be used for testing purposes.
